text: ⚠️"Over the objections of its medical advisory board, the FDA approved Zohydro, a new drug that has 5 to 10 times more of the heroin-like opioid hydrocodone than Vicodin."

metadata.raw_text: ⚠️"Over the objections of its medical advisory board, the FDA approved Zohydro, a new drug that has 5 to 10 times more of the heroin-like opioid hydrocodone than Vicodin."

text: To clarify, Zohydro ER is NOT in an-easy-to-crush tablet, but has been remade in a tamper-resistant form. It is NOT a "whopping dose" of hydrocodone, but an extended release (ER) medication that lasts 12 hours...

metadata.raw_text: To clarify, Zohydro ER is NOT in an-easy-to-crush tablet, but has been remade in a tamper-resistant form. It is NOT a "whopping dose" of hydrocodone, but an extended release (ER) medication that lasts 12 hours...

text: "The recently approved long acting hydrocodone product (Zohydro ER) has not even hit the streets yet but the misinformation, conspiracy theories and media warnings abound... [via] the anti-opioid fringe; the ones that never seem to let facts confuse them." http://paindr.com/zohydro-so-hydro-no-hydro-what-do-you-think/

text: And hydrcodone and oxycodone are two different medicines. Hydro is Vicodin. Yes they make a long acting one now, called zohydro
